TopicTitle: KSP CLOSES SUDDENLY BY ITSELF [no crash log or memory over usage]

Articles.Content:
so i was editing a vessel on sph and i open the craft filer chooser and witch window when the ksp SUDDENLY closes! the game didn't have an external window that says that ksp crashed my ram is 8GB and i run ksp_x64 

reproduce:unknow

mods

*inter-installer extended

*near future solar

*near future construction

*near future spacecraft

*KIS 

*KAS

Hi regardless of there being a crash or not,  there will always be a KSP.log written,  located in your main ksp folder, this will be needed in order for any kind of bug hunting,  zip up the KSP.log  upload to dropbox or similar and post a link here.
